about_the_game:
Unlock every ending and achievement with the Alpha Hole Prison strategy guide!

Once you purchase and download this DLC to your Steam Library, you can find the files for it in your Local Files. Right-click the name of the game from the list of games in your library, click Properties, go to the Local Files tab, then click Browse Local Files. You'll find the strategy guide in this folder.
detailed_description:
Wishlist our Upcoming Games!



Play For Free!


About the Game

Unlock every ending and achievement with the Alpha Hole Prison strategy guide!

Once you purchase and download this DLC to your Steam Library, you can find the files for it in your Local Files. Right-click the name of the game from the list of games in your library, click Properties, go to the Local Files tab, then click Browse Local Files. You'll find the strategy guide in this folder.
